ti

Class CosineWithFeedback

  • java.lang.Object
    • ti.Cosine
      • ti.CosineWithFeedback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RetrievalModel

    public class CosineWithFeedback
extends Cosine
    Implements retrieval in a vector space with the cosine similarity function and a TFxIDF weight formulation, plus pseudorelevance feedback.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CosineWithFeedback

        public CosineWithFeedback(int feedbackDepth,
                  double feedbackAlpha,
                  double feedbackBeta)
        Creates a new retriver with the specified pseudorelevance feedback parameters.
        Parameters:
        feedbackDepth - number of documents to consider relevant.
        feedbackAlpha - relative weight of the original query terms
        feedbackBeta - relative weight of the expanded terms.

    • Method Detail

      • runQuery

        public ArrayList<Tuple<Integer,Double>> runQuery(String queryText,
                                        Index index,
                                        DocumentProcessor docProcessor)
        Runs the given query and returns the list of documents sorted by similarity.
        Specified by:
        runQuery in interface RetrievalModel
        Overrides:
        runQuery in class Cosine
        Parameters:
        queryText - the text of the query.
        index - the index to search in.
        docProcessor - the DocumentProcessor to extract query terms.
        Returns:
        a list of Tuples where the first item is the docID and the second one the similarity score.

      • computeFeedbackVector

        protected ArrayList<Tuple<Integer,Double>> computeFeedbackVector(ArrayList<Tuple<Integer,Double>> queryVector,
                                                     ArrayList<Tuple<Integer,Double>> results,
                                                     Index index)
        Computes the modified query vector for relevance feedback.
        Parameters:
        queryVector - the original query vector.
        results - the results with the original query.
        index - the index to search in.
        Returns:
        a list of Tuples with the termID as first item and the weight as second one.
